title: Apartment to share in Paris' Promised Land
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


A fantastic, 55 square meter apartment with a big kitchen, a big living room and a little balcony. Aside from his or her room – which is entierely furnished – my roommate will dispose of storage shelves in the bathroom, cupboards in the kitchen, as well as his or her own fridge. There’s a washer-dryer in the apartment. It’s situated on a pedestrian walkway, so there’s no traffic noise. What’s more, it’s facing north. In other words it’s cool in the summer (it doesn’t become a steambath) and warm in the winter (individual heating with natural gas). There’s a caretaker in the building.

We’re in a neighbourhood which is quiet, yet accessible to all budgets. The building is located next to an Autolib' station, a Vélib' station, a bus stop, a metro station and the tramway. It’s near the Parc de la Villette in the 19th District. 
In the apartment there will be you, me and my cat. I’m looking for a roommate ready to do his or her share of the housework in the common parts of the apartment and to share the rent, for an equitable and convivial cohabitation.
